## StreamBaseConfig.transportOptions property

Optional network settings applied by the transport implementation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
transportOptions?: {
        headers?: Record<string, string>;
        query?: Record<string, string | number | boolean | null | undefined>;
        timeoutMs?: number;
    };
```
